title: Point of sales
description: Streamline your sales with our lightweight, web-based POS system.  Enjoy a modern, easy-to-use interface that's accessible from any device.

title: Rent My Time
description: RentMyTime is a online platform that connects individuals seeking specific services or companionship with individuals offering their time and expertise.

title: MessageTTF
description: Web App where you can store your cherished memories in the form of messages, photos, and audio files. Set a date range, and we'll send your time capsule right when the future-you least expects it!

title: Club Chaser
description: The ultimate guide to the nightlife and events in the United Kingdom. Not only offers valuable insights into the vibrant nightlife but also provides the convenience of purchasing tickets and accessing event locations through an interactive map.

title: Warehouse Stock Check
description: A User-friendly warehouse stock checking app! Allow you to effortlessly manage and monitor your inventory in real-time. Stay informed about the availability of products, track their movement within the warehouse, and streamline your operations for optimal efficiency.
